doc:
Marcel Vallée https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcel_Vall%C3%A9e 0 Marcel Vallée (born Paris, 15 January 1880 - died Fontaine-le-Port, 31 October 1957) was a French actor, primarily of the theater. He began working in films with Max Linder in 1906. He appeared in some American films. Marcel_Vallée ( born_Paris , 15_January_1880 - died Fontaine-le-Port , 31_October_1957 ) was a_French_actor , primarily of the_theater . He began_working in films with Max_Linder in 1906 . He appeared in some_American_films .
